name: ManaPlus
description: ManaPlus is an extended client for Evol Online, The Mana World, and similar servers based on a fork of eAthena. Evol Online is a 2D fantasy-style game which aims to create a friendly environment for interacting with others where people can escape reality and enjoy themselves. The Mana World (TMW) is a serious effort to create an innovative free and open source MMORPG. TMW uses 2D graphics and aims to create a large and diverse interactive world.
